website_summaries.verdict: True to its name, the Tiffen Steadicam Smoothee takes the bounce out of your iPhone video clips.
pros: The Tiffen Steadicam Smoothee for iPhone 4 is an effective way to get smoother video while moving
cons: The Smoothee takes some practice to use well and for the average iPhone user, the size and cost might be overkill

customer_reviews.title: great investment
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a steadicam for years and jumped at the chance when I discovered this version for the iPhone. If you take the time to adjust the balance, it works extremely well. Practice with it for a day or two and it becomes second nature. Freed from the constraints of a tripod, the Smoothee extends the iPhone video capabilities to use in nature, on the street, at festivals, etc. and it is FUN to use. Within a day or two, it felt completely comfortable to handle, lightweight enough to use for extended times, with great results. One of the best camera accessories I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: composer

customer_reviews.title: Insane!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I interchange between the iPhone 4, 5, and GoPro Hero.2 and all the video comes out incredible. When comparing to handheld shooting there is no doubt this is worth the money. My first try at this and the video looked semi-pro. The setup is super easy and it really only takes a few hours to get decent at it. The weight is substantial and the product doesn't feel cheap. I wish it came with some sort of case or even foam cutout to protect it, but overall no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE!

customer_reviews.title: You get out what you put in
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing, well-crafted pro-sumer device with a gravity-free sensation. This is not for those who want instant results. As others have mentioned, you can get amazingly professional and highly-refined results, but only with significant effort learning how to naturally position and move with the device. Day 3 of shooting my large family reunion, things started to meld and my results became more consistent. However, I am not under any illusions, that probably 10-20 more hours of practice were necessary to get A- results.

product_meta.title: Steadicam Smoothee for iPhone 4 and iPhone 4S
product_meta.description: Style:iPhone 4The Steadicam Smoothee is specifically designed and engineered to work with your iPhone 4/4s. Based on the same technology as the big $60,000 rigs used in Hollywood, it allows iPhone 4/4s owners to capture incredible video without the shakes normally associated with hand-held video shot on the go, right out of the box, the very first time. The Steadicam Smoothee is small and agile enough to take on vacations or follow the action at sporting events. The Smoothee lets you "fly" wherever the scene takes you--up and down steps, indoors and outside, through crowds--almost anywhere, with precise, elegant control and ease. Its quick release mount lets you instantly swap camera connections between your Smoothee and any tripod. While designed for the iPhone 4/4s the patented quick release removable mount also serves as a tabletop stand or can be mounted to any tripod with a standard ¼ x20-Inch camera mount. The comfortable ergonomic hand-grip folds up securely when not in use. Also included with the Steadicam Smoothee is a quick guide DVD on how to get the best possible shots, along with a carrying strap. The lightweight, compact, agile, and easy to use Steadicam Smoothee features an innovative, patented design built around a durable mono-frame metal structure that requires no complicated instruction to use. With its "go anywhere" compact dimensions, the Steadicam Smoothee is approximately 8-Inch W x 14.5-Inch H x 2.5-Inch D (20.3 x 36.8 x 6.4cm) in operating configuration.
